医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的抗生素化合物在与MRSA的战斗中成为有力的候选人用于治疗超级细菌和其他细菌感染的新抗生素的开发是全球的重中之重，当前的抗生素无法治疗的感染速率上升，并呈现了对人类健康最大的威胁之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-antibiotic-compound-emerges-emerges-as-as-astrong-candidate-in-the-the-the-the-fight-against-mrsa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-antibiotic-compound-emerges-emerges-as-as-astrong-candidate-in-the-the-the-fight-against-mrsa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6519711-6002-44fe-a53d-f619c2394e37 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 12:14:40 -0400 New antibiotic compound emerges as strong candidate in the fight against MRSA
USC研究人员揭示了中风后尿失禁背后的大脑活动一项使用功能磁共振成像（fMRI）的新的USC领导的研究揭示了导致尿失禁的神经机制，这是一种影响中风幸存者的常见状况，对其生活质量产生了重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/usc-researchers-reveal-brain-brain-activity-behind-post-post-stroke-stroke-rinary-rinary-incontinence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/usc-researchers-reveal-reveal-brain-activity-behind-behind-post-post-stroke-stroke-stroke-urinary-incontinence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f8DC58C-5514-41BB-90FA-5577F713C7BC Thu, 10 Apr 2025 08:24:34 -0400 USC researchers reveal brain activity behind post stroke urinary incontinence
新研究将重点放在哮喘的遗传原因上基因组广泛的关联研究（GWAS）已经确定了数百个基因组区域，其中包含数千种与哮喘相关的遗传变异，但仍不清楚哪些变体与该疾病有实际因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-study-sharpens-focus-on-gocus-on-genetic-causes-os-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-study-sharpens-focus-on-gocus-on-genetic-causes-os-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=251f2d43-6922-4AA2-4AA2-8AB3-B181CF7E268A Thu, 10 Apr 2025 08:09:03 -0400 New study sharpens focus on genetic causes of asthma
来源生物科学获取剑桥临床实验室Source Bioscience UK Ltd是一家行业领先的基因组服务和组织病理学诊断的提供商，今天宣布已完成对剑桥临床实验室（CCL）的收购，CCL临床实验室（CCL）是剑桥领先的临床，个性化的医疗保健测试服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/source-bioscience-acquires-acquires-cambridge-cambridge-clinical-laboratories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/source-bioscience-acquires-camquires-cambridge-cambridge-clinical-laboratories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=decbeede-c77b-415c-a652-581d4f4fd8901f Thu, 10 Apr 2025 07:43:00 -0400 Source Bioscience acquires Cambridge Clinical Laboratories
谁发布了第一个全球指南以改善脑膜炎护理世界卫生组织（WHO）今天已经发布了其脑膜炎诊断，治疗和护理的第一本全球指南，旨在加快检测，确保及时治疗并改善对受影响者的长期护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/who-releases-first-global-guidelines-to-robal-guidelines-to-improve-menenitis-isitis-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/who-releases-first-global-guidelines-to-robal-guidelines-to-improve-meningitis-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86296e84-dfdc-4675-812a-22e70aa4d57e Thu, 10 Apr 2025 07:35:21 -0400 WHO releases first global guidelines to improve meningitis care

食品添加剂是否与2型糖尿病有关？这项研究确定了与较高的2型糖尿病风险相关的食物添加剂混合物，敦促对合并添加剂的安全评估进行重新评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/are-food-additives-linked-to-type-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/are-food-additives-linked-to-type-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=852370ff-dfe6-478C-96E9-27C5023FB0AC Thu, 10 Apr 2025 06:56:00 -0400 Are food additives linked to type 2 diabetes?
